#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/toggle-typing-status#parameter-inbox-identifier)

inbox\_identifier

string

required

The identifier obtained from API inbox channel

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/toggle-typing-status#parameter-contact-identifier)

contact\_identifier

string

required

The source id of contact obtained on contact create

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/toggle-typing-status#parameter-conversation-id)

conversation\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the conversation

#### Query Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/toggle-typing-status#parameter-typing-status)

typing\_status

string

required

Typing status, either 'on' or 'off'

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/conversations-api/toggle-typing-status#body-typing-status)

typing\_status

enum<string>

The typing status to set

Available options:

`on`,

`off`

Example:

`"on"`
